ias.title: Current Account: %s
ias.disclaimer.title: Security Disclaimer
ias.disclaimer.text: Within your game directory '%s' a folder named '%s' has been created. DO NOT SEND THIS FOLDER TO ANYONE. If you did send this folder to anyone, follow the steps described in the 'Help Me I Shared My Accounts' file.
ias.accounts.login.offline: Selected account doesn't support online-mode authentication.
ias.login.link: Authentication page has been opened in your browser. Link was also copied to the clipboard.
ias.error: An unexpected error has occurred. See the log files and/or game console for more details. While we have tried to remove any sensitive data, you should *NOT* publish your logs.
ias.add.microsoft.tip: Normal Minecraft account with Microsoft authentication and full access.
ias.add.offline.tip: Offline Minecraft account without authentication and without access to online servers.
ias.offline.name: Name
ias.offline.name.short: Names shorter than 3 characters may not be accepted by some servers. Hold %s and click this button to add anyway.
ias.offline.name.long: Names longer than 16 characters may not be accepted by some servers. Hold %s and click this button to add anyway.
ias.offline.name.character: Names with '%s' character may not be accepted by some servers. Hold %s and click this button to add anyway.
ias.microsoft.password.tip: Encrypt this account with a password. This is the most secure option. If you forget the password, you will need to add the account into the mod again. WILL protect your account data from MOST malware and accidental sharing.
ias.microsoft.hardware.tip: Encrypt this account with the current hardware ID. This is the less secure, but more convenient. If you change your hardware, you will need to add the account into the mod again. MAY protect your data from SOME malware and accidental sharing.
ias.microsoft.plain.tip.off: Do not encrypt this account. This is not secure at all. Do not use this option unless you know what you're doing. Press %s + %s to enable this option.
ias.microsoft.plain.tip.on: Do not encrypt this account. This is not secure at all. Do not use this option unless you know what you're doing.
ias.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete '%s' account?
ias.delete.hint: Hold %s while clicking 'Delete' to skip this confirmation.
ias.nick.blank: Your (blank) nick '%s' may cause some servers to prevent you from joining.
ias.nick.short: Your (too short) nick '%s' may cause some servers to prevent you from joining.
ias.nick.long: Your (too long) nick '%s' may cause some servers to prevent you from joining.
ias.nick.chars: Your nick '%s' (containing invalid characters) may cause some servers to prevent you from joining.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.ias: Allows you to change which account you are signed in to in-game without restarting Minecraft.
modmenu.summaryTranslation.ias: Allows you to change your account in-game.
